description.S1: Follow up with Junlei to let her know the radiators are fixed and to claim your reward.

blurb.B1: Return and speak to Junlei to complete the quest.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: My boards are returning to green. What a weight that is off my shoulders. I don't normally tolerate outsiders mucking about in my station's guts, but you're all right.

dialog.speaker: JunleiTennyson (Female)
dialog.utterance: The temperature should be dropping as we speak. I'll see to it the crew knows who kept us all from boiling alive.
